links: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..40
formula: a(n) ~ c * 3^(n*(n+1)), where c = Product_{k>=1} (1-1/9^k) = A132037 = 0.876560354035964205836019838417862010106635101174... . - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Nov 21 2015a(n) = 9^(binomial(n+1,2))*(1/9;1/9)_{n}, where (a;q)_{n} is the q-Pochhammer symbol. - _G. C. Greubel_, Dec 24 2015a(n) = Product_{i=1..n} A024101(i). - _Michel Marcus_, Dec 27 2015
prog: (MAGMA) [1] cat [&*[ 9^k-1: k in [1..n] ]: n in [1..11]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 24 2015(PARI) a(n) = prod(i=1, n, 9^i-1); \\ _Altug Alkan_, Dec 24 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
